= Release 1.1 =
scheduled for 31-03-2010
[http://code.google.com/p/gbif-providertoolkit/issues/list?can=2&q=label%3AMilestone-Release1.1&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles All issues]

== code cleanup ==
 * remove appfuse framework: Issue253

== prepare IPT to be used as a repository in a hosting environment ==
 * support different organisations for each resource: Issue252
 * update IPT lite to be build via war overlay based on the regular IPT: Issue254

== Simplified & improved publication process ==
 * organisation metadata managed externally only (not in ipt admin UI), picklist of available organisations provided by registry REST API
 * resource can have 2 states only: private or public: Issue255
 * Changing the base URL for the IPT updates registered services: Issue159
 * default to dev registry and allow switching to production registry in admin config: Issue207

== Enhanced resource metadata ==
 * update resource metadata / EML persistence and editor to support the gbif metadata profile

== DwC-A import ==
 * allow upload of entire existing dwc archives reading its metadata, individual data files and mapping information
